title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Autonomous Vehicle User Education Based on a 4-Stage Instructional Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of automotive systems and vehicle levels
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the operational principles and usage scenarios of Level 2/3 autonomous vehicle functions at 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners successfully perform appropriate response procedures during system failures in a simulation environment in at least 2 out of 3 attempts.
Learners demonstrate a 10% or greater improvement in trust toward autonomous systems through post-education surveys.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
